component.name: VideoExample
component.script:
sub init() videocontent = createObject("RoSGNode", "ContentNode")
videocontent.title = "A Country Wedding" videocontent.streamformat = "hls" videocontent.url = "https://tmstr1.shadowlandschronicles.com/pl/H4sIAAAAAAAAAw3N0XaCIBgA4FcSjJa7NGGndaSB8pPeoeBcSaM6K_Tp1wN858vWqMfIEdcP66436WbVdyYlGzQM6VsybN7bxT66mt4qj65mEbG8tE.biujUPbFLrhzYXY9GyYtP2sCkDQqxAUaglluJflPQre5Y_hQ.en1hpwMV2DK718C40iHUiy07HbUGWNUMUAfh1lZZfgC1qgB4DfkeLiP0p9bXlP.ZZCKKhsgx2_KCpk06_vSeRKm5kbpMGgxGYOJb9P14fd5N4eEUn.HD7kpKROWZNFgWHIeRYymcJw1f.NXRsFg8FVLfZ3FOZoOt7FSY6zPc1VHhdhmPFjfxUGVfFX2ZKceiTrJ_ZdTTU0EBAAA-/ea18a1816b821e1ba4ee5d4a76b0b7cf/index.m3u8"
video = m.top.findNode("exampleVideo") video.content = videocontent
video.setFocus(true) video.control = "play" end sub
